result.ga: fan amach ón dream sin
result.html: fan amach ón dream sinStay away from those people.
result.ponchtml: fan amaċ ón dream sinStay away from those people.

result.eng: The Polish are the most numerous immigant group to Ireland. This is so because of the high population of Poland.
result.ga: is iad na polannaigh an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn tá sé sin amhlaidh toisc a mhéad atá daonra na polainne
result.orig: Is iad na Polannaigh an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn Tá sé sin amhlaidh toisc a mhéad atá daonra na Polainne
result.html: is iad na polannaigh an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn tá sé sin amhlaidh toisc a mhéad atá daonra na polainneThe Polish are the most numerous immigant group to Ireland. This is so because of the high population of Poland.
result.ponchtml: is iad na polannaiġ an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn tá sé sin aṁlaiḋ toisc a ṁéad atá daonra na polainneThe Polish are the most numerous immigant group to Ireland. This is so because of the high population of Poland.

result.eng: For those who escaped, it was a good thing that they did.
result.ga: ba mhaith an mhaise don dream a d'éalaigh
result.orig: Ba mhaith an mhaise don dream a d'éalaigh
result.html: ba mhaith an mhaise don dream a d'éalaighFor those who escaped, it was a good thing that they did.
result.ponchtml: ba ṁaiṫ an ṁaise don dream a d'éalaiġFor those who escaped, it was a good thing that they did.

result.eng: The biggest thing to notice on these people is how amateurish they were.
result.ga: an rud is mó atá le tabhairt faoi deara ar an dream seo ná chomh hamaitéarach is a bhí siad
result.orig: An rud is mó atá le tabhairt faoi deara ar an dream seo ná chomh hamaitéarach is a bhí siad
result.html: an rud is mó atá le tabhairt faoi deara ar an dream seo ná chomh hamaitéarach is a bhí siadThe biggest thing to notice on these people is how amateurish they were.
result.ponchtml: an rud is mó atá le taḃairt faoi deara ar an dream seo ná ċoṁ hamaitéaraċ is a ḃí siadThe biggest thing to notice on these people is how amateurish they were.
